https://openminds.om-i.org/props/IRI.name: IRI

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/custodi._instruction: Add all parties that fulfill the role of a custodian for this creative work (e.g., a corresponding author). Custodians are typically the main contact in case of misconduct, obtain permission from the contributors to publish personal information, and maintain the content and quality of the creative work.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/custodi.description: The 'custodian' is a legal person who is responsible for the content and quality of the data, metadata, and/or code of a research product.
